mapper.update:
update fund_managecom_base
base_id = #{baseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ch_name = #{chName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
com_attribute = #{comAttribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cdate = #{cdate,jdbcType=DATE},
regist_capital = #{registCapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
legal_representative = #{legalRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manager = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
regist_addr = #{registAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Office_addr = #{officeAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
web_site = #{webSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
postcode = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

fund_num = #{fundNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manage_scale = #{manageScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manager_num = #{managerNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fund_managecom_base set base_id = #{baseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ch_name = #{chName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_attribute = #{comAttribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cdate = #{cdate,jdbcType=DATE}, regist_capital = #{registCapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_representative = #{legalRepresentative,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regist_addr = #{registAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Office_addr = #{officeAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, web_site = #{webSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postcode = #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_scope = #{businessScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fund_num = #{fundNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manage_scale = #{manageScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_num = #{managerNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id from jjml_glgs where REPLACE(NAME,'Â ','') =#{excelComNamae}

select ch_name,en_name,com_attribute,DATE_FORMAT(cdate,'%Y-%m-%d') cdate,regist_capital,legal_representative,manager,regist_addr, Office_addr,web_site,postcode,email,tel,fax,business_scope,fund_num,manage_scale,manager_num from fund_managecom_base where 1=1
and ch_name = #{comName}

SELECT manager_name,fund_code,fund_name,fund_type,DATE_FORMAT(start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') start_date,DATE_FORMAT(end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') end_date,tenure,job_return FROM fund_manager WHERE 1=1
and manager_name = #{managerName}

SELECT come_name,DATE_FORMAT(bdate,'%Y-%m-%d') bdate,duration_buy,duration_redeem,final_total,final_net_asset FROM fund_scale_change WHERE 1=1
and come_name = #{comName}
